titleStmt.title: An enquiry after further satisfaction concerning obeying a change of government beleeved to be unlawfull. Tendred to the Presbyterian proposer, by way of reply to his book intituled; The lawfulnesse of obeying the present government. By a dissenting brother.

notesStmt.note: Identified as Wing R2042 on UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1641-1700".
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Cambridge University Library.
